title: El gran salto
overview: A story of the fall into hell after achieving glory for Olympic champion Gervasio Deferr, narrated in two time periods: the past, with the different Olympic Games Gervasio won, which will take us back in time: Sydney, Athens, and Beijing. And, on the other hand, the present, focusing on the days it will take him to visit his mother, who suffered a heart attack while hospitalized. A crucial event that will undoubtedly shape the athlete's destiny for the rest of his life.
